job_history.work_description: Led and managed team in providing strategic insights into Americas DTC (ecommerce and retail) and eyewear product business lines, increasing visibility to the business and building models that analyzed potential growth opportunities and their financial impact.

Worked collaboratively with budget managers to plan annual budgets, quarterly and rolling forecasts for Americas DTC sales channels and back office functions, building out full projected profit/loss statements with dilution factors.
Performed closed shop analysis for 55 U.S. malls in Westfield portfolio and analyzed leasing revenue and costs for recently vacated spots and new tenants moving in.

Performed research and analysis on various industries and markets and compiled data into publication format for delivery to over 40,000 firm clients, including C-level executives, financial professionals and industry analysts.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial analysis, including building models, analyzing growth opportunities, and creating profit/loss statements, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Collaborated with budget managers to plan annual budgets and quarterly forecasts, showing strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Performed research and analysis on various industries and markets, and compiled data into publication format, suggesting strong proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led and managed a team in providing strategic insights, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Modeling
skills.explanation: Built models that analyzed potential growth opportunities and their financial impact, showing strong proficiency in financial modeling.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Provided strategic insights into business lines, increasing visibility to the business, suggesting strong proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Compiled data into publication format for delivery to over 40,000 firm clients, including C-level executives, financial professionals, and industry analysts, showing solid working proficiency in communication.
